meanings.definition: The ability to produce a desired or intended result.
meanings.sent1: Her efficacity in solving complex problems impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The new software's efficacity in increasing productivity was evident to all.
meanings.sent3: The magician's efficacity in pulling rabbits out of hats never failed to amuse the audience.
meanings.sent4: His efficacity in persuading others was like a powerful magnet drawing people to his ideas.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's efficacity in saving the city made him a legend among the citizens.

meanings.definition: The power to produce an effect.
meanings.sent1: The storm's efficacity in causing damage was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The medicine's efficacity in relieving pain was remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's efficacity in making a mess was both impressive and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The artist's efficacity in evoking emotions through her paintings was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's efficacity in inspiring her students was unmatched.
